CustomField.formula: TEXT(Drive_OEM__c) + " " + Drive_Customer_Solution_Formula__c + " " + Drive_Data_connection_Formula_Reference__c + " " + TEXT(Model__c) + " " + TEXT( GB_Data_connection__c ) + " " + TEXT( Bluepoint_data_connection__c ) + " " +TEXT(Bluepoint_site_ID__c) + " " + TEXT(Bluepoint_site_identifier__c)
CustomField.label: Data connection details
